content: Take out the Revenant Charface and Charbone guarding the chest, then open it to collect Fine Gold Thread and a Mind Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
Take out the Revenant Charface and Charbone guarding the chest, then open it to collect Fine Gold Thread and a Mind Core.
